items.question: What is included in the rental price?
items.answer: All rentals include a helmet and lock. Free delivery is available for monthly rentals within Mataram and Praya areas. Fuel is not included.

items.question: Can you deliver to my location?
items.answer: We offer free delivery for monthly rentals to Mataram and Praya areas. For daily and weekly rentals, pick up is available at our location or we can arrange delivery for a fee.

items.question: What are the age requirements?
items.answer: Renters must be at least 18 years old and have a valid driving license.

items.question: What payment methods do you accept?
items.answer: We accept cash (IDR or USD), bank transfer, and popular payment apps. Payment details will be provided when you book via WhatsApp.

items.question: What if I have a breakdown or accident?
items.answer: We provide 24/7 support. Contact us immediately and we'll help you sort it out.

items.question: Do you offer weekly or monthly discounts?
items.answer: Yes! We offer significant discounts for weekly and monthly rentals. Check our pricing for each bike.

items.question: How far in advance should I book?
items.answer: We recommend booking at least 24 hours in advance, especially during high season (July-August, December-January).

items.question: Can I extend my rental period?
items.answer: Yes, just contact us via WhatsApp before your rental period ends and we'll arrange an extension if the bike is available.

terms.title: Terms & Conditions
terms.subtitle: Please read these terms carefully before renting from Lombok Local
terms.questionsSubtitle: If you have any questions or need clarification about our terms and conditions, please don't hesitate to contact us.

bikeModal.termsRequired: Please agree to the terms before contacting us

rentalRequirements: Renters must be between 17 and 70 years old
Valid driver's license from your country is required
Valid ID Card or Passport must be left as deposit during rental period
Full payment required upon receiving the vehicle
usageTerms: Scooters must NOT be driven outside of Lombok Island
Only authorized riders may operate the scooter - do not allow others who don't know how to drive it
Operating the vehicle under the influence of alcohol or drugs is strictly forbidden
All traffic signs and regulations must be strictly followed
Rental rates are calculated on a 24-hour clock basis

liability.warningDesc: The renter is fully responsible for all parts of the scooter during the rental period.
items: In case of accident causing damage to the scooter, renter is liable for costs between $250 - $500 USD depending on the extent of damage
If the bike is lost or stolen during the rental period, the renter is fully responsible for the replacement cost
Renters must consent to being photographed when receiving the fleet for documentation purposes
